data.actual_result: The call button is over the top of the "not connected text"
data.expected_result: The call button is in between the "not connected" and "connect to voice" text
data.short_description: [4 inch devices only] The call button is not placed correctly in voice chat
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user or bot you aren't friends with  - Call the user or bot, and observer the call button
